name: Super Spider Hero: City Adventure
description:
Download this best simulator stickman game for free! Tap fast and fly like a super spider hero.

* Exciting simulator game rope stickman!
* Enjoy city adventure with rope stickman hero.
* Special tricks with suit upgrades for super spider hero.
* Tons of challenges to test the skills of super spider hero

As Stickman rope Hero evil clones invaded the town, the true hero comes to help the citizen. Use your skills to fly your Stickman rope Hero across city. Remember to Tap and hold to keep swinging in the air.

Tap fast and stick your line to the end Super Spider Hero.
